  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The Main method starts the Quiz. This method asks user whether they would like to read the instructions for the game, asks user's name, picks which area of questions user would prefer, reads the picked questions and answers froom a external file, and plays the quiz game.
      Parameters:
      args - The command-line argument passses to the program.
      answer - Takes answer y or n from user's input.
      area - Takes the given area of questions (1 or 2).

    • printManual

      public static void printManual()
      This method prints the manual for the Quiz and asks users to confirm they have read the instructions pressing "Q" and want to continue to the actual game.
      Parameters:
      answer - Takes the continue command "Q" from user's input.

    • askUsersName

      public static void askUsersName()
      Method asks player's name and writes it to the file.
      Parameters:
      name - Takes user's input.

    • pickArea

      public static int pickArea()
      The method returns the area of questions user has picked.
      Parameters:
      area - Takes user's input for area (1 or 2).
      Returns:
      Returns the picked area.

    • readQuestions

      public static ArrayList<String> readQuestions(int area)
      Method reads question from the file depending of which area has been chosen (1 or 2).
      Parameters:
      kysymysrivi - Reads a question from the file..
      vastausrivi - Reads an answer from the file.
      Returns:
      Returns ArrayList which has been filled with questions from the file.

    • randomQuestion

      public static int randomQuestion()
      The method gives a random number that will determine the question.
      Parameters:
      numero - The variable that stores the random number.
      Returns:
      Returns the value of the variable numero.

    • playGame

      public static void playGame(ArrayList<String> kysymykset, ArrayList<String> vastaukset, int area)
      The method prints the questions and accepts the answer as user input, after which it will compare the answer to the correct answer got from the answers file. Once the player has answered the number of questions set with the kysymystenMaara variable, the method announces the game is over and prints the player's points, and writes them in the file.
      Parameters:
      kysymystenMaara - how many questions will be asked
      kaytettyLuku - keeps track of how many questions have been asked
      pisteet - keeps track of the points the player has gotten from correct answers
      indeksi - the index of the question being asked, the row number of it
      kysymys - the question read from the questions file
      oikeaVastaus - the correct answer read from the answers file
      vastaus - the answer input given by the player
